sentences.sContent: The order was no longer effective.
He could resist her charm no longer.
sentences.sCn: 他再也抗拒不住她的魅力。

sentences.sContent: She no longer feared that they should misunderstand her.
sentences.sContent_eng: She no longer feared that they should misunderstand her.
sentences.sCn: 她不再害怕他们会误解她了。
